title: Malicious File Monitor
description: Developed an application in TypeScript that monitors a specified folder and its subfolders for new or updated files, checking them for malware using the VirusTotal API. If a file is identified as malicious, it is moved to a "quarantine" folder, and a detailed notification is sent to a Slack channel about the action taken.

title: Meeting Management System
description: Developed a platform for colleges and organizations to schedule & manage online meetings. Automated deployments with Docker and GitHub Actions for smooth integration and scaling. Set up NGINX as a reverse proxy to enhance secure access.

title: Video Repository
description: Video Repository, enabling efficient storage, streaming & sharing of videos. Utilized NodeJS, ExpressJS & Typescript to build a secure & organized platform for easy video file management.

title: Chatty
description: Real-time chatting app, built with ReactJs and Socket.io. Features instant messaging, user presence, and typing indicators.

title: V-duo
description: Real-time video chatting app, built with ReactJs and Socket.io. Supports peer-to-peer video calls and screen sharing.

title: Taskmate
description: A ReactJS based to-do list app for efficient task management. Features task categorization, due dates, and local storage persistence.

title: New-s Tab Extension
description: This is the new-tab type of extension which will keep you updated with latest news on your new tab.
